MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL18 postcode area of Bodelwyddan, affecting properties in Artillery Row and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.55PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the work required to repair a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.20PM on 11th March 2021.
